writer.name: 焦瓦尼·阿洛伊 Giovanni Aloi

director.name: 焦瓦尼·阿洛伊 Giovanni Aloi

introduction: 此纪录片跟踪拍摄有关特殊生活爱好群体的平日生活及夜晚聚集处——<Decadence>重口味俱乐部。'Pan Play Decadence' tells the story of the poignant lives of people united by their passion for 'transgression'. Felico, a hockey champ in a wheelchair, Kraian, a school teacher fond of S & M, Federicona, a romantic fifty year old transsexual that works in the streets, still in love with the man with whom she was engaged to twenty years ago. These are just some of the stories that intersect in this living fresco: 'Pan Play Decadence' is a film in the making, a document of a contemporary world, ranging from little-known instances of collective and individual needs, the search for touching paths of intimate salvation.
